statements: SELECT * FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT engagement_level FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT teacher_id, student_id, engagement_level, performance_score FROM TeacherEngagement ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE engagement_level = 'Low' AND performance_score < 60;
SELECT * FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, engagement_level FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT teacher_id, student_id, engagement_level, performance_score FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM TeacherEngagement WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT teacher_id, engagement_level, performance_score FROM TeacherEngagement ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE department = 'Mathematics';
SELECT id, name FROM teachers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT name, email FROM teachers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE engagement_score > 80 AND performance_score <= 90;
SELECT id, performance_score FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE id = '1d8159ed-5e3f-4c44-a609-b2a521190dff';
SELECT name, email FROM teachers WHERE department = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_performance ORDER BY engagement_score ASC, performance_score DESC;
SELECT t.name, sp.engagement_score FROM teachers t JOIN student_performance sp ON t.id = sp.student_id WHERE sp.performance_score > 85;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_teachers FROM teachers GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement;
SELECT student_id, game_level, time_played FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, test_score, progress_percentage FROM student_performance ORDER BY test_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, game_level, time_played FROM student_engagement WHERE game_level >= 5;
SELECT teacher_id, engagement_score FROM teacher_analytics WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE game_level > 5 ORDER BY time_played DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_score, progress_percentage FROM student_performance WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY test_score ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, engagement_score, performance_score FROM teacher_analytics WHERE engagement_score > 80 AND performance_score < 70 ORDER BY teacher_id;
SELECT student_id, game_level, time_played FROM student_engagement WHERE time_played BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY game_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_score, progress_percentage, completion_status FROM student_performance WHERE progress_percentage >= 90 ORDER BY test_score DESC, progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT grade, engagement_score FROM students WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT name, subject FROM teachers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT course_id, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, grade FROM students WHERE age >= 18 AND grade = 'A' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT students.name, grades.grade, courses.name AS course_name FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grades.grade IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY students.name ASC, courses.name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT teachers.name AS teacher_name, subjects.subject_name, courses.name AS course_name FROM teachers JOIN subjects ON teachers.subject = subjects.subject_name JOIN courses ON teachers.teacher_id = courses.teacher_id ORDER BY teacher_name ASC, course_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses_enrolled FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses_enrolled > 3 ORDER BY num_courses_enrolled DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM courses JOIN teachers ON courses.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC, engagement_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, engagement_score FROM students WHERE grade_level = 11 AND engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT teacher_name, department, course_name FROM teachers JOIN courses ON teachers.teacher_id = courses.teacher_id WHERE department = 'Science' ORDER BY teacher_name ASC, course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE due_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY due_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT students.student_name, assignments.assignment_name, grades.grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN assignments ON grades.assignment_id = assignments.assignment_id WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY grades.grade DESC LIMIT 5;
